detectors.description:
Contract locking ether found in :

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description:

	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TBCToken.sol#33)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TBCToken.sol#35)
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TBCToken.sol#52-60)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TBCToken.sol#78-83)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/TBCToken.sol#39)
